name: Slice Works
tagline: Slice Works | Marketing, Social, Strategy and More
description:
Experts in Integrated Marketing Strategy — and much more.
Since we incorporated 20 years ago, Slice Works has earned a reputation for delivering outstanding marketing, branding and design services. We embrace our client’s goals as our own — and then plan and execute the strategic solutions needed to accomplish them. As our slogan says, You Imagine It, We Achieve It!
We offer a full portfolio of skills and talents, from planning and managing integrated marketing campaigns to graphic design, website development and more. Our proprietary SharpStrategy process helps us guide clients from brainstorming to customized, polished concepts that are ready to put into action.
We’re driven by the same core values that drive our clients: trust, integrity, and a commitment to excellence. These qualities, along with our emphasis on creating long-term relationships with our clients, are what keep us going.
